name: @microjs/microjs-plugins-dal
description: Плагин Microjs для взаимодействия с базой данных
author: Konstantin Dark

scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run watch:babel & npm run watch:other
scripts.deploy: npm run version:patch && git push --tags origin HEAD
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile:babel && npm run compile:other && git add -A build
scripts.postversion: npm run rm-latest && npm run add-latest
scripts.rm-latest: git tag -d latest && git push --delete origin latest
scripts.add-latest: git tag -a latest -m "latest" && git push --tags origin HEAD
scripts.version:patch: npm run compile && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: npm run compile && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: npm run compile && npm version major
